main.name: Joseph Mok
main.description: I am an aspiring Data Scientist, who's goal is continuously develop my skills in Machine Learning and Data Science. I develop mainly with Python and Google Cloud Platform to create Machine Learning models. Please explore my website to dive into my latest projects!
main.bio: Hi there! My name is Joseph Hojin Mok and I've been developing various Machine Learning models for 2 years now!
main.bio2: I'm a University of Waterloo Alumnus with a Bachelors in Mechanical Engineering and currently working at Fluence Analytics as both a Machine Learning Specialist and Automation Engineer.
main.bio3: For my role, I've developed multiple Machine Learning models and data analytics tools for our flagship product, the ACOMP.
main.bio4: Furthermore, I have experienced working in the Food & Beverage, Automotive, Optical, and Tech Industries. Thanks to this, I've developed a broad range of domain knowledge across several industries, which I believe is a powerful asset when developing Machine Learning solutions for multiple fields.
main.contactmessage: Got a question or would like to connect? Send me an email!

skillmessage.description2: • ML Libraries:  ‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‎TensorFlow/Keras, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn, OpenCV, spaCy, NLTK, PySpark
skillmessage.description4: • ML on Cloud:‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎   ‎‏‏‎   Docker, Kubernetes, Kubeflow, and Apache Airflow on GCP

education.degree: Bachelor of Applied Science, Honours Mechanical Engineering
education.description1: • Completed courses on advanced calculus, ODEs, electro-mechanical design, manufacturing, simulations, and programming in Python, C++, Matlab, & Ladder Logic
education.description2: • Team lead and mechanical designer for the UW Robotics Teams. Lead the team to 2nd in Canada and 15th globally in the 2017 University Rover Challenge, a competition where teams design a Mars Rover robot to perform various desert operation tasks. Designed the mechanical arm for our Rover

education.degree: Machine Learning on Google Cloud Platform with Tensorflow Certificate
education.description1: • Completed 9 courses to learn how to develop machine learning models and pipelines on Google Cloud Platform

work.title: Machine Learning and Automation Engineer
work.description1: • Developed data mining process that extracts PLC transmitter data, stores in MySQL database, and presents it to Client application designed in Python and Ignition Automation software
work.description2: • Lead the automation design for several SCADA systems for beverage manufacturing clients by integrating Rockwell Automation PLCs/HMIs, Ignition Automation Software, MySQL, and ethernet IP networks
work.description3: • Determined root cause of production halts through strong troubleshooting skills for hardware and software
work.description4: • Sourced transmitters, motors, and any necessary hardware for new automation systems

work.title: Automation Engineer
work.description1: • Developed data mining process that extracts PLC transmitter data, stores in MySQL database, and presents it to Client application designed in Python and Ignition Automation software
work.description2: • Lead the automation design for several SCADA systems for beverage manufacturing clients by integrating Rockwell Automation PLCs/HMIs, Ignition Automation Software, MySQL, and ethernet IP networks
work.description3: • Determined root cause of production halts through strong troubleshooting skills for hardware and software
work.description4: • Sourced transmitters, motors, and any necessary hardware for new automation systems

work.title: Recycling R&D Engineer Intern
work.description1: • Managed development of recycling systems for Apple products. Coordinated with vendors and internal Product Design teams to organize documentation and deadlines
work.description2: • Developed optimal cycle time processes for de-manufacturing of various Apple products. Resulted in a 90% increase in the Unit-per-Hour output compared to the manual methods
work.description3: • Designed semi-autonomous electro-mechanical prototypes to showcase cycle time improvement and disassembly effectiveness. Designs continuously integrated feedback to improve operator ergonomics and to meet relevant California E-waste regulations
work.description4: • Created several DFM iterations and manufactured prototypes by machining & 3D printing

work.title: Hardware Engineer Intern
work.description1: • Designed an automated manufacturing robot for glue dispensing on TASER flex circuits
work.description2: • 3D printed, laser cut, machined, soldered, and programmed in Arduino to build prototype
work.description3: • Performed root cause analysis to identify problems in new TASER prototype samples

projects4.title: Breast Cancer Diagnosis

projects4.title: Respiratory Disease Survival
